Name: Bounces
Description: Set the maximum number of light ray bounces

Name: Both
Warning: Known to have issues with some versions of Source.

Name: Final
Description: Increases the quality of light_environment and indirect lighting by spending more time firing rays.

Name: Extra Sky
Description: Trace N times as many rays for indirect light and sky ambient.

Name: Lights File
Description: Load a custom lights file in addition to lights.rad and map-specific lights file.

Name: Smooth
Description: Set the threshold for smoothing groups, in degrees.

Name: Luxel Density
Description: Scale down luxels. Maximum value is 1.
Warning: Too low a value can cause lighting errors.

Name: Static Prop Sample Scale
Description: To get proper lighting on static props 16 = slow, high quality, 4 = default and 0.25 = fast, low quality
Warning: Note that adding -final is the same as having -StaticPropLightingScale 16.

Name: Static Prop Polys
Description: Generate lighting on props at polygon precision.

Name: Texture Shadows
Description: Generates lightmap shadows from $translucent surfaces of models. (Not brushes)

Name: Threads
Description: Override the number of CPU threads used.

Name: Disable Skybox Recursion
Description: Turn off recursion into 3d skybox (skybox shadows on world).

Name: Verbose
Description: Turn on verbose output for debug purposes.
